caption: This is a soul/R&B music piece. There is a trio of two male vocalists and a female vocalist singing melodically. The keyboard is holding the chords in the background while the electric guitar and the bass guitar are playing a groovy tune. The rhythmic background contains an electronic drum beat. The atmosphere is urban. The piece could be played during a retro-themed party at a nightclub.
